ing: 1 1/2 (6 ounce) cans water, or more as needed
des: "Perfect for those days lounging by the pool or out cruising in the boat. Concocted this while looking for something a little different.  Put ours in the freezer and scoop out whenever we get the urge."
ins: Combine orange juice, lemonade concentrate, limeade concentrate, vodka, and water in a large bowl; stir until blended. Serve over crushed ice.
